alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 13 at 7:47PM CDT until August 13 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of central Missouri and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Saline. In west central Missouri, Lafayette. * WHEN...Until 745 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 742 PM CDT, Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen today across the warned area. This has resulting in flooding along Davis and Salt Pond Creeks. Highway VV at Davis Creek and Highway 127 at Salt Pond Creek are closed due to high water. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Higginsville, Concordia, Sweet Springs, Emma and Aullville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
